backend/main.mo: Defines user-specific finance data structures and maps, category and transaction comparators, and profile/category/transaction/receipt storage with access control and mixins.
feature_evidence.json: Lists implemented features with associated files, components, tests, and confidence metadata.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Provides high-level summaries for all frontend source files for reference or documentation.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining theme variables, light/dark mode palettes, and base styling.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Configures authentication gating, profile setup, theme provider, and routing for main pages.
frontend/src/components/analytics/Cashfl: UI card displaying cashflow insights, trends, and largest expense category using formatted data.
frontend/src/components/auth/AccessDenie: Screen shown to unauthenticated users with lock icon, message, and login button.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Provides a login/logout button using Internet Identity and clears queries on logout with status-based UI states.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Displays a dialog for entering and saving the user's name with validation and mutation handling.
frontend/src/components/calendar/DayTran: Shows a modal listing all transactions for a specific day, grouped with category names and formatted amounts.
frontend/src/components/categories/Categ: Dialog for creating or editing a category with fields for name, type, color, and icon, saving via mutations.
frontend/src/components/charts/CashflowT: Renders a 6‑month cashflow line chart computed from transactions.
frontend/src/components/charts/ExpenseCa: Generates a pie chart of current‑month expenses grouped by category, with fallback when no data exists.
frontend/src/components/charts/IncomeExp: Displays a 6‑month bar chart comparing income and expenses.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: Defines the main app layout with sidebar, header, and routed content outlet.
frontend/src/components/layout/Header.ts: Header bar showing sidebar toggle, theme switch, user greeting, and login button.
frontend/src/components/layout/SidebarNa: Sidebar navigation with menu links, active state handling, app branding, and a footer with attribution.
frontend/src/components/receipts/Receipt: Handles image selection, validation, preview, upload, and removal for transaction receipts.
Displays a full-size receipt image inside a dialog modal.
frontend/src/components/theme/ThemeToggl: Toggles between light and dark themes using next-themes.
frontend/src/components/transactions/Rec: Fetches and displays a small clickable receipt thumbnail with a modal preview.
frontend/src/components/transactions/Tra: Form dialog for creating or editing transactions, including category selection and optional receipt upload.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, refetching dependent queries on changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides authentication context using Internet Identity, handling login, logout, and identity restoration.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: React Query hooks for fetching and mutating categories, transactions, receipts, and user profiles.
frontend/src/i18n/id.ts: Indonesian translation strings for navigation, transactions, categories, calendar, validation, and toasts.
frontend/src/index.css: Configures Tailwind layers and defines extensive CSS variables for light and dark themes along with base global styles.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/CalendarPage.tsx: Renders a monthly transaction calendar with daily income/expense summaries and a modal for viewing transactions per day.
frontend/src/pages/CategoriesPage.tsx: Displays and manages income and expense categories with add, edit, and delete functionality via dialogs.
frontend/src/pages/DashboardPage.tsx: Shows a financial dashboard including monthly totals, alerts, charts, and a dialog for adding transactions.
frontend/src/pages/TransactionsPage.tsx: Provides a searchable, filterable, sortable list of transactions with add, edit, and delete options.
frontend/src/utils/currency.ts: Contains helper functions for formatting and parsing Indonesian currency values.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers for reading URL query/hash parameters and storing, retrieving, or clearing them in sessionStorage, including a persisted getter that favors URL values.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, radius, shadows, animations, typography, container queries, and Inter font, extending a themed design system.
project_state.json: Stores the project’s state, version, feature list, architecture notes, and summary for a personal finance web app.
